Add devices to the monitored SNMP devices

parameters.name: snmp_host
parameters.description: IP address or symbolic name of and an SNMP device

parameters.name: snmp_read_community
parameters.description: The SNMP read community to use (SNMP v1/v2c only)

parameters.name: snmp_write_community
parameters.description: The SNMP write community to use (SNMP v1/v2c only)

parameters.name: snmp_version
parameters.description: The SNMP version to use: 2 (SNMP v3), 1 (v2c) or 0 (v1)

parameters.name: snmp_level
parameters.description: Used only with SNMP v3: noAuthNoPriv, authNoPriv, or authPriv)

parameters.name: snmp_auth_protocol
parameters.description: Used only with SNMP v3 and level not set to noAuthNoPriv: MD5 or SHA

parameters.name: snmp_auth_passphrase
parameters.description: Used only with SNMP v3 and level not set to noAuthNoPriv: 8 chars+ passphrase

parameters.name: snmp_privacy_protocol
parameters.description: Used only with SNMP v3 and level set to autPriv: DES or AES

parameters.name: snmp_privacy_passphrase
parameters.description: Used only with SNMP v3 and level set to autPriv: 8 chars+ passphrase

parameters.name: cidr
parameters.description: Either 24 or 32. If 32, snmp_host is treated as single host. If 24 snmp_host is treated as as CIDR address
